activities:
As industry leaders of custom simulation pre-employment tests and developers of the innovative Virtual Job Tryout candidate evaluation process, Shaker Consulting Group has provided the staffing and talent management disciplines with a best-in-class resource for achieving workforce differentiation. Virtual Job Tryout combines the value of a highly interactive and branded candidate experience, the rigor and decision science of industrial psychology, and the efficiency and accessibility of the internet.

Shaker offers analytical tools and scientific methodology to help business managers increase the value that people contribute to their company's bottom line results.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: N/A - we do not process personal data
